Get Off Your Ass And Create Something

# Comments18 December 2013

I just posted a medium article on the difference between those that do and those that don't. Its a look into the creative process, what leads to the creation of things, what hinders the creative process and how to get past those road bumps in the process.  I had a good time writing it, plus I think you're cool so you should read it.
